Description:
Change to authentication method could be an indicator of an attacker adding an auth method to the account so they can have continued access.

Author: AlertIQ
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Change to Authentication Method
Query: sourcetype="azure-auditlogs" loggedbyservice="Authentication Methods" category="UserManagement" operationname="User registered security info"
